text_logic_form: The line $ST$ is parallel to the line $RQ$.
The length of the line $PT$ is $7.5$ units.
The length of the line $TQ$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $SR$ is $2.5$ units.
Find the length of the line $PS$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $ST$ is parallel to the line $RQ$.
The length of the line $PT$ is $7.5$ units.
The length of the line $TQ$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $SR$ is $2.5$ units.
Find the length of the line $PS$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $T$ lies on the line connecting $P$ and $Q$.
Point $S$ lies on the line connecting $P$ and $R$.
The line $TS$ is parallel to the line $QR$.
line_instances: There are lines $PQ$, $PR$, $PS$, $PT$ forming a triangle and its extensions.
There are lines $QR$, $QT$ and $TS$ forming a parallel line to one side of the triangle.
There are lines $RS$ and $TS$ forming a transversal line to the triangle.
